MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the ST7 postcode area of Scholar Green, affecting properties in Drumber Lane, Birch Tree Lane, Mill Lane, Springbank, Moorson Avenue and Station Road and the surrounding areas, affecting a large number of properties in a widespread area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown, with some supplies being removed at 09.30am and further supplies being removed at 11.30am to replace faulty equipment on both our overhead and underground network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09.11am on 27th April 2021.
